textBeforeTable: Design the form as follows:   Click Close and click Close colHourlySalary     System.Double 8.75 HourlySalary   colTitle         Title   colFullName   LastName + ', ' + FirstName     FullName   colLastName         LastName False colFirstName         FirstName   colEmployeeNumber True       EmployeeNumber False (Name) Unique Expression DataType DefaultValue ColumnName AllowDBNull Click Add 5 times and change the properties as follows:   To create a new table, click Add and change the properties as follows: TableName: Employee (Name): tblEmployee Click Tables and click its ellipsis button In the Properties window, change the following characteristics: DataSetName: dsEmployees (Name): Employees Select the Untyped Dataset radio button and click OK From the Data section of the Toolbox, click DataSet and click the form Set the Name to Employees and click Add To create a new Click Columns and click its ellipsis button
textAfterTable: Private Sub EmployeesLoad(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load Dim Filename As String = "employees.xml" If File.Exists(Filename) Then dsEmployees.ReadXml(Filename) End If End Sub End Class In the Method Name combo box, select FormClosing and implement the event as follows: Private Sub EmployeesFormClosing(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs) Handles Me.FormClosing dsEmployees.WriteXml("employees.xml") End Sub In  the Class Name combo box, select btnClose In the Method Name combo box, select Click and implement the event as follows: Private Sub btnCloseClick(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles btnClose.Click Close() End Sub Return to the form Under the form, right-click dsEmployees and click Copy Display the LoanAllocations form Right-click it and click Paste To create a new form, in the Solution Explorer, right-click WattsALoan1 -> Add -> Windows Forms... Set the Name to Customers and click Add From the Data section of the Toolbox, click DataSet and click the form Select the Untyped Dataset radio button and click OK In the Properties window, change the following characteristics: DataSetName: dsCustomers (Name): Customers Click Tables and click its ellipsis button To create a new table, click Add and change the properties as follows: TableName: Customer (Name): tblCustomer Click Columns and click its ellipsis button Click Add 5 times and change the properties as follows:   AllowDBNull ColumnName Unique (Name) False AccountNumber True colAccountNumber
